title: Handle Project Change Request
description: In the middle of an implementation project, a customer requests a new feature that is outside the original SOW.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the customer's request and review the original SOW to confirm the feature is out of scope.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant validates that the request constitutes a scope change.

tasks.description: Estimate the additional effort (hours) required for the new feature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant provides an accurate estimate for the extra work.

tasks.description: Create a change order document outlining the new scope, timeline impact, and additional cost.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant creates a formal change order for the customer to approve.
